title: ninaindurugum enai
sahitya:
ninaindurugum enai varunda viDalAmO niddiraiyilum unai


anupallavi

  kaninda tInjuvai kalanda su-svara gAna kalA rasikan ennEramum


caraNam    jAti mata bhASai bhEdamillAmalE tannuyir pOlavE mannuyir kAttiDum
 nItiyum nAvalar bhAvalar pAl nirai kIrtiyum unpugazh paravum tirumalar
